import React from 'react' import "./style.css"; import { IconButton } from '@mui/material'; import DeleteIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Delete" import SendIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Send" import MessageOthers from './MessageOthers'; import MessageSelf from './MessageSelf'; function ChatArea({ props }) { return (

{props.name[0].toUpperCase()}

{props.name}

{props.timeStamp}

) } export default ChatArea
